content.title: Downlink L1 throughputs per IMSI/RNTI [Mbps]
Uplink L1 throughputs per IMSI/RNTI [Mbps]
SNR per IMSI/RNTI reported by UE [dB]

content.query:
// Average L2 CQI report
Janus_CL
| where stream_type_s == "janus"
    and stream_context_info_codelet_set_id_s == "csi_stats"
| project stream_payload_time_t, p=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)
| project stream_payload_time_t, cell_id=todouble(p.cellId), csi_max=p.l2CsiMax
| mv-expand csi_max
| project stream_payload_time_t, cell_id, rnti=tostring(csi_max.rnti), cqi_max=todouble(csi_max.val)
| where toint(rnti) >= 20000 and toint(rnti) <= 22000
| summarize max=max(cqi_max) by bin(stream_payload_time_t, 10s), rnti
| render timechart
content.title: Average L2 CQI report

content.query:
// Max consecutive HARQ loss
Janus_CL
| where stream_type_s == "janus"
    and stream_context_info_codelet_set_id_s == "harq_dl_stats"
| project stream_payload_time_t, p=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)
| order by stream_payload_time_t desc
| project stream_payload_time_t, cell_id=todouble(p.cellId), harq_cnt=p.l2HarqConsMax
| mv-expand harq_cnt
| project stream_payload_time_t, rnti=tostring(harq_cnt.rnti), 
    cons_max=toint(harq_cnt.val)
| summarize max=max(cons_max) by bin(stream_payload_time_t, 10s), rnti
| render timechart with (ycolumns=max, series=rnti, xcolumn=stream_payload_time_t)
content.title: Max DL L2 HARQ consecutive loss

content.query:
// Average L2 HARQ loss
Janus_CL
| where stream_type_s == "janus"
    and stream_context_info_codelet_set_id_s == "harq_dl_stats"
| project stream_payload_time_t, p=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)
| project stream_payload_time_t, cell_id=todouble(p.cellId), harq_cnt=p.l2HarqCnt
| mv-expand harq_cnt
| project stream_payload_time_t, rnti=tostring(harq_cnt.rnti), 
    avg_loss=(todouble(harq_cnt.nack) + todouble(harq_cnt.dtx))/todouble(harq_cnt.cnt) * 100
| summarize avg=avg(avg_loss) by bin(stream_payload_time_t, 10s), rnti
| render timechart with (ycolumns=avg, series=rnti, xcolumn=stream_payload_time_t)
content.title: Average DL L2 HARQ loss [%]

content.query:
// Average L2 UL loss
Janus_CL
| where stream_type_s == "janus"
    and stream_context_info_codelet_set_id_s == "crc_stats"
| project stream_payload_time_t, p=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)
| order by stream_payload_time_t desc
| project stream_payload_time_t, cell_id=todouble(p.cellId), 
  crc_max=p.l2Max, crc_min=p.l2Min, crc_avg=p.l2Avg
| mv-expand crc_avg
| project stream_payload_time_t, rnti=tostring(crc_avg.rnti), 
    avg_loss=todouble(crc_avg.loss)/todouble(crc_avg.total) * 100
| where toint(rnti) >= 20000 and toint(rnti) <= 22000
| summarize avg=avg(avg_loss) by bin(stream_payload_time_t, 10s), rnti    
| render timechart with (ycolumns=avg, series=rnti, xcolumn=stream_payload_time_t)
content.title: Average UL L2 HARQ loss [%]

parameters.name: host_name_s
parameters.label: Host
parameters.query:
Minerva_CL
| where stream_type_s startswith "arista"
| distinct host_name_s

content.query:
Minerva_CL
| where stream_type_s == "arista_interface_description" and host_name_s in ({host_name_s:value})
| project payload=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s), host_name_s, TimeGenerated
| project host_name_s, name=tostring(payload.name), description=tostring(payload.description), TimeGenerated
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by host_name_s, name, description
| project-rename Host=host_name_s, Name=name, Description=description, ReportTime=TimeGenerated
content.title: Interface Description

content.query:
Minerva_CL
| where stream_type_s == "arista_mac_table" and host_name_s in ({host_name_s:value})
| project payload=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s), host_name_s, TimeGenerated, stream_payload_time_t
| mv-expand bagexpansion=array payload
| where payload[0] !in ("source", "path")
| project phy_address=tostring(split(payload[0], "/")[0]), payload, TimeGenerated, host_name_s, stream_payload_time_t
| project phy_address, key=substring(payload[0], strlen(phy_address) + 1), value=payload[1], TimeGenerated, host_name_s, stream_payload_time_t
| extend p=bag_pack(key, value)
| summarize bag=make_bag(p) by phy_address, host_name_s, stream_payload_time_t
| summarize arg_max(stream_payload_time_t, *) by phy_address, host_name_s
| evaluate bag_unpack(bag)
| project-rename Host=host_name_s, PhysicalAddress=phy_address, ReportTime=stream_payload_time_t
content.title: MAC table

content.query:
Minerva_CL
| where stream_type_s == "arista_arp_table" and host_name_s in ({host_name_s:value})
| project payload=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s), host_name_s, TimeGenerated, stream_payload_time_t
| mv-expand bagexpansion=array payload
| where payload[0] !in ("source", "path")
| project phy_address=tostring(split(payload[0], "/")[0]), payload, TimeGenerated, host_name_s, stream_payload_time_t
| project phy_address, key=substring(payload[0], strlen(phy_address) + 1), value=payload[1], TimeGenerated, host_name_s, stream_payload_time_t
| extend p=bag_pack(key, value)
| summarize bag=make_bag(p) by phy_address, host_name_s, stream_payload_time_t
| summarize arg_max(stream_payload_time_t, *) by phy_address, host_name_s
| evaluate bag_unpack(bag)
| project-rename Host=host_name_s, PhysicalAddress=phy_address, ReportTime=stream_payload_time_t
content.title: ARP table

content.query:
let Available=Minerva_CL
| where stream_type_s == "arista_state_memory" and host_name_s in ({host_name_s:value})
| project available=tolong(todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s).available), host_name_s, TimeGenerated
| where isnotempty(available)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by host_name_s
| project available, host_name_s;

Minerva_CL
| where stream_type_s == "arista_state_memory" and host_name_s in ({host_name_s:value})
| project utilized=tolong(todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s).utilized), host_name_s, stream_payload_time_t
| where isnotempty(utilized)
| join kind=inner Available on host_name_s
| project util_per = 100 * toreal(utilized)/available, host_name_s, stream_payload_time_t
| extend p = bag_pack(host_name_s, util_per)
| summarize bag=make_bag(p) by stream_payload_time_t
| evaluate bag_unpack(bag)
| render timechart
content.title: Memory Utilization

content.query:
Minerva_CL
| where stream_type_s == "arista_cpu_utilization" and host_name_s in ({host_name_s:value})
| project utilized=toint(todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s).instant), host_name_s, stream_payload_time_t
| where isnotempty(utilized)
| extend p = bag_pack(host_name_s, utilized)
| summarize bag=make_bag(p) by stream_payload_time_t
| evaluate bag_unpack(bag)
| render timechart
content.title: CPU Utilization

content.query:
Minerva_CL
| where stream_type_s == "arista_temperature" and host_name_s in ({host_name_s:value})
| project temperature=toreal(todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s).instant), name=strcat(host_name_s, " ", tostring(todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s).name)), TimeGenerated
| extend p = bag_pack(name, temperature)
| summarize bag=make_bag(p) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
| evaluate bag_unpack(bag)
| render timechart
content.title: Temperature

parameters.name: interface_s
parameters.label: Interface
parameters.query:
Minerva_CL
| where stream_type_s == "arista_ifcounters"
| project value=tostring(todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s).name)
| where isnotempty(value)
| distinct value

content.query:
Minerva_CL
| where stream_type_s == "arista_ifcounters" and host_name_s in ({host_name_s:value})
| project value=tolong(todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s).in_broadcast_pkts), name=tostring(todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s).name), TimeGenerated, host_name_s
| where isnotempty(value)
| project value, TimeGenerated, interface=strcat(host_name_s, " ", name)
| order by interface, TimeGenerated asc
| extend value=iff("{view_type:value}" == "Difference", iff(prev(interface)==interface, value-prev(value),0), value)
| extend p=bag_pack(interface, value)
| summarize bag=make_bag(p) by TimeGenerated
| evaluate bag_unpack(bag)
| render timechart
content.title: Broadcast

content.query:
let timeStart = todatetime({timeparameter:start});
let timeEnd = todatetime({timeparameter:end});

let phy_ul_stats = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "MAC_SCHED_CRC_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp))
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| extend 
    avgSinr = todouble(stats_d.avg_sinr),
    avgRsrp = todouble(stats_d.avg_rsrp)
| where not(isempty(imsi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time| 
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| summarize ulSinr_avg=avg(avgSinr), ulRsrp_avg=avg(avgRsrp) by imsi
;

let mac_dl_harq_failures = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "MAC_SCHED_DL_HARQ"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp))
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend 
    txCount = toint(stats_d.perHarqTypeStats.MAC_HARQ_EVENT_TX.tbs.pkts),
    reTxCount = toint(stats_d.perHarqTypeStats.MAC_HARQ_EVENT_RETX.tbs.pkts)
| extend failureRate = iif(txCount + reTxCount == 0, 0.0, reTxCount  * 100.0 / (txCount + reTxCount))
| extend imsi = supi
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| summarize 
    dlHarq_avgF=avg(failureRate) by imsi
;

let mac_ul_harq_failures = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "MAC_SCHED_UL_HARQ"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp))
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend 
    txCount = toint(stats_d.perHarqTypeStats.MAC_HARQ_EVENT_TX.tbs.pkts),
    reTxCount = toint(stats_d.perHarqTypeStats.MAC_HARQ_EVENT_RETX.tbs.pkts)
| extend failureRate = iif(txCount + reTxCount == 0, 0.0, reTxCount  * 100.0 / (txCount + reTxCount))
| extend imsi = supi
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| summarize 
    ulHarq_avgF=avg(failureRate) by imsi
;

let rlc_dl_stats = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "RLC_DL_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), 
  isSRB = toint(stats_d.is_srb), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp)),
  avgSduTxDelay = todouble(stats_d.sdu_tx_completed.avg) / 1000000,
  numSduTx = toint(stats_d.sdu_tx_completed.count),
  avgSduDeliveryDelay = todouble(stats_d.sdu_tx_delivered.avg) / 1000000,
  avgSduQueueBytes = todouble(stats_d.sdu_queue_bytes.avg),
  pduTxBytes = todouble(stats_d.pdu_tx_bytes.total)
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| summarize 
    rlc_dl_SduTxLatency_avg=avg(avgSduTxDelay), 
    rlc_dl_SduDeliveryLatency_avg=avg(avgSduDeliveryDelay), 
    rlc_dl_SduQueueBytes_avg=avg(avgSduQueueBytes) by imsi
;

let rlc_ul_stats = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "RLC_UL_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), 
  isSRB = toint(stats_d.is_srb), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp)),
  avgSduDeliveryDelay = todouble(stats_d.sdu_delivered_latency.avg) / 1000000,
  avgSduQueueBytes = todouble(stats_d.sdu_queue_bytes.avg)
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| summarize rlc_ul_SduDeliveryLatency_avg=avg(avgSduDeliveryDelay) by imsi
;

let pdcp_dl_stats = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "PDCP_DL_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), 
  isSRB = toint(stats_d.is_srb), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp)),
  sduDiscarded = todouble(stats_d.sdu_discarded),
  pduWindowPkts_avg = todouble(stats_d.pdu_window_pkts.avg),
  sduTxLatency_avg = todouble(stats_d.sdu_tx_latency.avg)
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| summarize 
    pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg=avg(sduDiscarded),
    pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg=avg(pduWindowPkts_avg),
    pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg=avg(sduTxLatency_avg) by imsi
;

let pdcp_ul_stats = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "PDCP_UL_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), 
  isSRB = toint(stats_d.is_srb), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp)),
  pduWindowPkts_avg = todouble(stats_d.pdu_window_pkts.avg)  
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| summarize 
    pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg=avg(pduWindowPkts_avg) by imsi
;


let rlc_dl_traffic_stats = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "RLC_DL_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), 
  isSRB = toint(stats_d.is_srb), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp)),
  numSduTx = toint(stats_d.sdu_tx_completed.count)
| where isSRB == 0 // Ignore signalling bearers for data throughput\r\n
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| summarize 
    rlc_dl_SduTxCount=sum(numSduTx) by imsi
;

let pdcp_dl_traffic_stats = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "PDCP_DL_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), 
  isSRB = toint(stats_d.is_srb), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp)),
  newSdus = toint(stats_d.sdu_new_bytes.count)
| where isSRB == 0 // Ignore signalling bearers for data throughput\r\n
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| summarize 
    pdcp_dl_newSdus=sum(newSdus) by imsi
;

let pdcp_ul_traffic_stats = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "PDCP_UL_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), 
  isSRB = toint(stats_d.is_srb), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp)),
  pduWindowPkts_avg = todouble(stats_d.pdu_window_pkts.avg),
  sduDeliveredBytes = todouble(stats_d.sdu_delivered_bytes.total)  
| where isSRB == 0 // Ignore signalling bearers for data throughput\r\n
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| summarize 
    pdcp_ul_sduDeliveredBytes=sum(sduDeliveredBytes) by imsi
;

// Collate all results
let summary = phy_ul_stats
| join kind=fullouter  mac_dl_harq_failures on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  mac_ul_harq_failures on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  rlc_dl_stats on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  rlc_ul_stats on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  pdcp_dl_stats on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  pdcp_ul_stats on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  rlc_dl_traffic_stats on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  pdcp_dl_traffic_stats on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  pdcp_ul_traffic_stats on imsi
;

let good=2;
let empty=1;
let bad=0;

let good_emoji = "";
let empty_emoji = "";
let bad_emoji = "";

let result = summary
| extend ulSinrResult = case(
    isnull(ulSinr_avg) or isnan(ulSinr_avg), empty,
    ulSinr_avg > {PhyUlSinrThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend ulRsrpResult = case(
    isnull(ulRsrp_avg) or isnan(ulRsrp_avg), empty,
    ulRsrp_avg > {PhyUlRsrpThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend PhyResult = case(
    (ulSinrResult == bad or ulRsrpResult == bad), bad,
    (ulSinrResult == empty or ulRsrpResult == empty), empty,
    good
    )
| extend dlHarqResult = case(
    isnull(dlHarq_avgF) or isnan(dlHarq_avgF), empty,
    dlHarq_avgF < {MacHarqThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend ulHarqResult = case(
    isnull(ulHarq_avgF) or isnan(ulHarq_avgF), empty,
    ulHarq_avgF < {MacHarqThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend MacDlResult = case(
    (dlHarqResult == bad), bad,
    (dlHarqResult == empty), empty,
    good
    )
| extend MacUlResult = case(
    (ulHarqResult == bad), bad,
    (ulHarqResult == empty), empty,
    good
    )
| extend MacResult = min_of(MacDlResult, MacUlResult)
| extend RlcDlSduTxLatencyResult = case(
    isnull(rlc_dl_SduTxLatency_avg) or isnan(rlc_dl_SduTxLatency_avg), empty,
    rlc_dl_SduTxLatency_avg < {RlcDlSduTransmissionThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend RlcDlSduDeliveryLatencyResult = case(
    isnull(rlc_dl_SduDeliveryLatency_avg) or isnan(rlc_dl_SduDeliveryLatency_avg), empty,
    rlc_dl_SduDeliveryLatency_avg < {RlcDlSduDeliveryThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend RlcDlSduQueueBytesResult = case(
    isnull(rlc_dl_SduQueueBytes_avg) or isnan(rlc_dl_SduQueueBytes_avg), empty,
    rlc_dl_SduQueueBytes_avg < {RlcDlSduQueueBytesThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend RlcUlSduDeliveryLatencyResult = case(
    isnull(rlc_ul_SduDeliveryLatency_avg) or isnan(rlc_ul_SduDeliveryLatency_avg), empty,
    rlc_ul_SduDeliveryLatency_avg < {RlcUlSduDeliveryThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend RlcDlResult = case(
    (RlcDlSduTxLatencyResult == bad or RlcDlSduDeliveryLatencyResult == bad or RlcDlSduQueueBytesResult == bad), bad,
    (RlcDlSduTxLatencyResult == empty or RlcDlSduDeliveryLatencyResult == empty or RlcDlSduQueueBytesResult == empty), empty,
    good
    )
| extend RlcUlResult = case(
    (RlcUlSduDeliveryLatencyResult == bad), bad,
    (RlcUlSduDeliveryLatencyResult == empty), empty,
    good
    )
| extend RlcResult = min_of(RlcDlResult, RlcUlResult)
| extend PdcpDlSduTxLatencyResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg) or isnan(pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg), empty,
    pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg < {PdcpDlSduTransmissionThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend PdcpDlSduDiscardedResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg) or isnan(pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg), good,
    pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg < {PdcpDlSduDiscardedThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend PdcpDlPduWindowPktsResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg) or isnan(pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg), empty,
    pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg < {PdcpDlPduWindowPktsThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend PdcpUlPduWindowPktsResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg) or isnan(pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg), empty,
    pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg < {PdcpUlPduWindowPktsThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend PdcpDlResult = case(
    (PdcpDlSduTxLatencyResult == bad or PdcpDlSduDiscardedResult == bad or PdcpDlPduWindowPktsResult == bad), bad,
    (PdcpDlSduTxLatencyResult == empty or PdcpDlSduDiscardedResult == empty or PdcpDlPduWindowPktsResult == empty), empty,
    good
)
| extend PdcpUlResult = case(
    (PdcpUlPduWindowPktsResult == bad), bad,
    (PdcpUlPduWindowPktsResult == empty), empty,
    good
)
| extend PdcpResult = min_of(PdcpDlResult, PdcpUlResult)

| extend TrafficDlResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_dl_newSdus), bad,
    isnull(rlc_dl_SduTxCount), bad,
    pdcp_dl_newSdus < {TrafficDlThreshold}, bad,
    rlc_dl_SduTxCount < {TrafficDlThreshold}, bad,
    // check that the pdcp_dl_newSdus and rlc_dl_SduTxCount aew within 10% of each other
    abs(pdcp_dl_newSdus - rlc_dl_SduTxCount) <= 0.1 * iif(pdcp_dl_newSdus > rlc_dl_SduTxCount, pdcp_dl_newSdus, rlc_dl_SduTxCount), good,
    bad
)
| extend TrafficUlResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_ul_sduDeliveredBytes) or isnan(pdcp_ul_sduDeliveredBytes), bad,
    pdcp_ul_sduDeliveredBytes < {TrafficUlThreshold}, bad,
    good
)

| extend TrafficResult = case(
    TrafficUlResult == bad or TrafficUlResult == bad, bad,
    TrafficUlResult == bad or TrafficUlResult == empty, empty,
    good
    )

| extend RANResult = case(
    PhyResult == bad or
      MacResult == bad or
      RlcResult == bad or
      PdcpResult == bad, bad,
    PhyResult == empty or
      MacResult == empty or
      RlcResult == empty or
      PdcpResult == empty, empty,
    good
    )

| extend RAN = case(
    RANResult == empty, empty_emoji,
    RANResult == good, good_emoji,
    RANResult == bad, bad_emoji,
    "" 
    )

| extend Traffic = case(
    TrafficResult == empty, empty_emoji,
    TrafficResult == good, good_emoji,
    TrafficResult == bad, bad_emoji,
    "" 
    )

// collate all results to form overall Status for the UE
| extend Status = case(
    RANResult == bad or TrafficResult == bad, bad_emoji,
    good_emoji
    )

| project imsi, Status, RAN, Traffic
| order by imsi asc
;

result

content.query:
let timeStart = todatetime({timeparameter:start});
let timeEnd = todatetime({timeparameter:end});

let phyuls = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "MAC_SCHED_CRC_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp))
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| extend 
    avgSinr = todouble(stats_d.avg_sinr),

// Collate all results
let summary = phy_ul_stats
| join kind=fullouter  mac_dl_harq_failures on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  mac_ul_harq_failures on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  rlc_dl_stats on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  rlc_ul_stats on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  pdcp_dl_stats on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  pdcp_ul_stats on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  rlc_dl_traffic_stats on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  pdcp_dl_traffic_stats on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  pdcp_ul_traffic_stats on imsi
;

let good=2;
let empty=1;
let bad=0;

let good_emoji = "";
let empty_emoji = "";
let bad_emoji = "";

let result = summary
| extend ulSinrResult = case(
    isnull(ulSinr_avg) or isnan(ulSinr_avg), empty,
    ulSinr_avg > {PhyUlSinrThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend ulRsrpResult = case(
    isnull(ulRsrp_avg) or isnan(ulRsrp_avg), empty,
    ulRsrp_avg > {PhyUlRsrpThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend PhyResult = case(
    (ulSinrResult == bad or ulRsrpResult == bad), bad,
    (ulSinrResult == empty or ulRsrpResult == empty), empty,
    good
    )
| extend dlHarqResult = case(
    isnull(dlHarq_avgF) or isnan(dlHarq_avgF), empty,
    dlHarq_avgF < {MacHarqThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend ulHarqResult = case(
    isnull(ulHarq_avgF) or isnan(ulHarq_avgF), empty,
    ulHarq_avgF < {MacHarqThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend MacDlResult = case(
    (dlHarqResult == bad), bad,
    (dlHarqResult == empty), empty,
    good
    )
| extend MacUlResult = case(
    (ulHarqResult == bad), bad,
    (ulHarqResult == empty), empty,
    good
    )
| extend MacResult = min_of(MacDlResult, MacUlResult)
| extend RlcDlSduTxLatencyResult = case(
    isnull(rlc_dl_SduTxLatency_avg) or isnan(rlc_dl_SduTxLatency_avg), empty,
    rlc_dl_SduTxLatency_avg < {RlcDlSduTransmissionThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend RlcDlSduDeliveryLatencyResult = case(
    isnull(rlc_dl_SduDeliveryLatency_avg) or isnan(rlc_dl_SduDeliveryLatency_avg), empty,
    rlc_dl_SduDeliveryLatency_avg < {RlcDlSduDeliveryThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend RlcDlSduQueueBytesResult = case(
    isnull(rlc_dl_SduQueueBytes_avg) or isnan(rlc_dl_SduQueueBytes_avg), empty,
    rlc_dl_SduQueueBytes_avg < {RlcDlSduQueueBytesThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend RlcUlSduDeliveryLatencyResult = case(
    isnull(rlc_ul_SduDeliveryLatency_avg) or isnan(rlc_ul_SduDeliveryLatency_avg), empty,
    rlc_ul_SduDeliveryLatency_avg < {RlcUlSduDeliveryThreshold}, good,
    bad
)
| extend RlcDlResult = case(
    (RlcDlSduTxLatencyResult == bad or RlcDlSduDeliveryLatencyResult == bad or RlcDlSduQueueBytesResult == bad), bad,
    (RlcDlSduTxLatencyResult == empty or RlcDlSduDeliveryLatencyResult == empty or RlcDlSduQueueBytesResult == empty), empty,
    good
    )
| extend RlcUlResult = case(
    (RlcUlSduDeliveryLatencyResult == bad), bad,
    (RlcUlSduDeliveryLatencyResult == empty), empty,
    good
    )
| extend RlcResult = min_of(RlcDlResult, RlcUlResult)
| extend PdcpDlSduTxLatencyResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg) or isnan(pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg), empty_emoji,
    pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg < {PdcpDlSduTransmissionThreshold}, good_emoji,
    bad_emoji
)
| extend PdcpDlSduDiscardedResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg) or isnan(pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg), good_emoji,
    pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg < {PdcpDlSduDiscardedThreshold}, good_emoji,
    bad_emoji
)
| extend PdcpDlPduWindowPktsResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg) or isnan(pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg), empty_emoji,
    pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg < {PdcpDlPduWindowPktsThreshold}, good_emoji,
    bad_emoji
)
| extend PdcpUlPduWindowPktsResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg) or isnan(pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg), empty_emoji,
    pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg < {PdcpUlPduWindowPktsThreshold}, good_emoji,
    bad_emoji
)
| extend PdcpDlResult = case(
    (PdcpDlSduTxLatencyResult == bad or PdcpDlSduDiscardedResult == bad or PdcpDlPduWindowPktsResult == bad), bad,
    (PdcpDlSduTxLatencyResult == empty or PdcpDlSduDiscardedResult == empty or PdcpDlPduWindowPktsResult == empty), empty,
    good
)
| extend PdcpUlResult = case(
    (PdcpUlPduWindowPktsResult == bad), bad,
    (PdcpUlPduWindowPktsResult == empty), empty,
    good
)
| extend PdcpResult = min_of(PdcpDlResult, PdcpUlResult)
| extend TrafficDlResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_dl_newSdus), bad,
    isnull(rlc_dl_SduTxCount), bad,
    pdcp_dl_newSdus < {TrafficDlThreshold}, bad,
    rlc_dl_SduTxCount < {TrafficDlThreshold}, bad,
    // check that the pdcp_dl_newSdus and rlc_dl_SduTxCount aew within 10% of each other
    abs(pdcp_dl_newSdus - rlc_dl_SduTxCount) <= 0.1 * iif(pdcp_dl_newSdus > rlc_dl_SduTxCount, pdcp_dl_newSdus, rlc_dl_SduTxCount), good,
    bad
)
| extend TrafficUlResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_ul_sduDeliveredBytes) or isnan(pdcp_ul_sduDeliveredBytes), bad,
    pdcp_ul_sduDeliveredBytes < {TrafficUlThreshold}, bad,
    good
)
| extend PHY = case(
    PhyResult == empty, empty_emoji,
    PhyResult == good, good_emoji,
    PhyResult == bad, bad_emoji,
    "" 
    )
| extend MACUL = case(
    MacUlResult == empty, empty_emoji,
    MacUlResult == good, good_emoji,
    MacUlResult == bad, bad_emoji,
    "" 
    )
| extend MACDL = case(
    MacDlResult == empty, empty_emoji,
    MacDlResult == good, good_emoji,
    MacDlResult == bad, bad_emoji,
    "" 
    )
| extend RLCUL = case(
    RlcUlResult == empty, empty_emoji,
    RlcUlResult == good, good_emoji,
    RlcUlResult == bad, bad_emoji,
    "" 
    )
| extend RLCDL = case(
    RlcDlResult == empty, empty_emoji,
    RlcDlResult == good, good_emoji,
    RlcDlResult == bad, bad_emoji,
    "" 
    )
| extend PDCPUL = case(
    PdcpUlResult == empty, empty_emoji,
    PdcpUlResult == good, good_emoji,
    PdcpUlResult == bad, bad_emoji,
    "" 
    )
| extend PDCPDL = case(
    PdcpDlResult == empty, empty_emoji,
    PdcpDlResult == good, good_emoji,
    PdcpDlResult == bad, bad_emoji,
    "" 
    )
| extend TrafficDL = case(
    TrafficDlResult == empty, empty_emoji,
    TrafficDlResult == good, good_emoji,
    TrafficDlResult == bad, bad_emoji,
    "" 
    )
| extend TrafficUL = case(
    TrafficUlResult == empty, empty_emoji,
    TrafficUlResult == good, good_emoji,
    TrafficUlResult == bad, bad_emoji,
    "" 
    )

// collate all results to form overall Status for the UE
| extend StatusResult=(PhyResult + MacResult + RlcResult + PdcpResult + TrafficDlResult + TrafficUlResult)
| extend Status = case(
    StatusResult >= (6 * good), good_emoji,
    bad_emoji
    )

| project Status, PHY, MACUL, MACDL, RLCUL, RLCDL, PDCPUL, PDCPDL, TrafficUL, TrafficDL
;

result
| project-rename 
    ['MAC-UL'] = MACUL,
    ['MAC-DL'] = MACDL,
    ['RLC-UL'] = RLCUL,
    ['RLC-DL'] = RLCDL,
    ['PDCP-UL'] = PDCPUL,
    ['PDCP-DL'] = PDCPDL,
    ['Traffic-UL'] = TrafficUL,
    ['Traffic-DL'] = TrafficDL

let good=2;
let empty=1;
let bad=0;

let good_emoji = "";
let empty_emoji = "";
let bad_emoji = "";

let timeStart = todatetime({timeparameter:start});
let timeEnd = todatetime({timeparameter:end});
let duration = timeEnd - timeStart;
let maxPoints = 10000;  // Hard limit for visualization
let baseStep = case(
    duration >= 7d, 15m,
    duration >= 3d, 6m,     
    duration >= 48h, 4m, 
    duration >= 24h, 2m,
    duration >= 12h, 1m, 
    duration >= 4h, 30s,
    duration >= 1h, 15s,
    duration >= 15m, 5s,
    5s  // Default step size
);
let totalPoints = tolong(duration / baseStep);
let scaleFactor = ceiling(totalPoints * 1.0 / maxPoints);  // Ensure step scaling
let adjustedStep = baseStep * scaleFactor;

let empty_tb = datatable(label: string, timestamp: datetime, value: dynamic) [];

let bad_emoji = "";

let timeStart = todatetime({timeparameter:start});

| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"

| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time

| extend failureRate = iif(txCount + reTxCount == 0, 0.0, reTxCount  * 100.0 / (txCount + reTxCount))
| extend imsi = supi

| where imsi == "{IMSI}"
| summarize 
    dlHarq_avgF=avg(failureRate) by imsi
;
let mac_dl_harq_failures =

| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp))
| extend imsi = supi
| extend txCount=toint(stats_d.perHarqTypeStats.MAC_HARQ_EVENT_TX.tbs.pkts), reTxCount=toint(stats_d.perHarqTypeStats.MAC_HARQ_EVENT_RETX.tbs.pkts)
| extend failureRate = iif(txCount + reTxCount == 0, 0.0, reTxCount  * 100.0 / (txCount + reTxCount))
| where imsi == "{IMSI}"
| where not(isempty(imsi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time| 
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd

;

content.query:
let good=2;
let empty=1;
let bad=0;

let good_emoji = "";
let empty_emoji = "";
let bad_emoji = "";

let timeStart = todatetime({timeparameter:start});
let timeEnd = todatetime({timeparameter:end});

let rlcd = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "RLC_DL_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), 
  isSRB = toint(stats_d.is_srb), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp)),
  avgSduTxDelay = todouble(stats_d.sdu_tx_completed.avg) / 1000000,
  numSduTx = toint(stats_d.sdu_tx_completed.count),
  avgSduDeliveryDelay = todouble(stats_d.sdu_tx_delivered.avg) / 1000000,
  avgSduQueueBytes = todouble(stats_d.sdu_queue_bytes.avg),
  pduTxBytes = todouble(stats_d.pdu_tx_bytes.total)
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| where imsi == "{IMSI}"
| summarize 
    rlc_dl_SduTxLatency_avg=avg(avgSduTxDelay), 
    rlc_dl_SduDeliveryLatency_avg=avg(avgSduDeliveryDelay), 
    rlc_dl_SduQueueBytes_avg=avg(avgSduQueueBytes) by imsi
;
let rlc_dl_stats = 
    (rlcd
    | project imsi, rlc_dl_SduTxLatency_avg, rlc_dl_SduDeliveryLatency_avg, rlc_dl_SduQueueBytes_avg
    )
    | union (
        rlcd
        | summarize count() 
        | where count_ == 0
        | project imsi="{IMSI}", rlc_dl_SduTxLatency_avg=real(null), rlc_dl_SduDeliveryLatency_avg=real(null), rlc_dl_SduQueueBytes_avg=real(null)
    );

let rlcu = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "RLC_UL_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), 
  isSRB = toint(stats_d.is_srb), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp)),
  avgSduDeliveryDelay = todouble(stats_d.sdu_delivered_latency.avg) / 1000000,
  avgSduQueueBytes = todouble(stats_d.sdu_queue_bytes.avg)
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| where imsi == "{IMSI}"
| summarize rlc_ul_SduDeliveryLatency_avg=avg(avgSduDeliveryDelay) by imsi
;

let rlc_ul_stats = 
    (rlcu
    | project imsi, rlc_ul_SduDeliveryLatency_avg
    )
    | union (
        rlcu
        | summarize count() 
        | where count_ == 0
        | project imsi="{IMSI}", rlc_ul_SduDeliveryLatency_avg=real(null)
    );

rlc_dl_stats
| join kind=fullouter  rlc_ul_stats on imsi

| extend RlcDlSduTxLatencyResult = case(
    isnull(rlc_dl_SduTxLatency_avg) or isnan(rlc_dl_SduTxLatency_avg), empty_emoji,
    rlc_dl_SduTxLatency_avg < {RlcDlSduTransmissionThreshold}, good_emoji,
    bad_emoji
)
| extend RlcDlSduDeliveryLatencyResult = case(
    isnull(rlc_dl_SduDeliveryLatency_avg) or isnan(rlc_dl_SduDeliveryLatency_avg), empty_emoji,
    rlc_dl_SduDeliveryLatency_avg < {RlcDlSduDeliveryThreshold}, good_emoji,
    bad_emoji
)
| extend RlcDlSduQueueBytesResult = case(
    isnull(rlc_dl_SduQueueBytes_avg) or isnan(rlc_dl_SduQueueBytes_avg), empty_emoji,
    rlc_dl_SduQueueBytes_avg < {RlcDlSduQueueBytesThreshold}, good_emoji,
    bad_emoji
)
| extend RlcUlSduDeliveryLatencyResult = case(
    isnull(rlc_ul_SduDeliveryLatency_avg) or isnan(rlc_ul_SduDeliveryLatency_avg), empty_emoji,
    rlc_ul_SduDeliveryLatency_avg < {RlcUlSduDeliveryThreshold}, good_emoji,
    bad_emoji
)


| project 
    RlcDlSduTxLatencyResult, rlc_dl_SduTxLatency_avg,
    RlcDlSduDeliveryLatencyResult, rlc_dl_SduDeliveryLatency_avg,
    RlcDlSduQueueBytesResult, rlc_dl_SduQueueBytes_avg, 
    RlcUlSduDeliveryLatencyResult, rlc_ul_SduDeliveryLatency_avg

| extend MetricPairs = pack_array(
    pack("Metric", "DL Tx latency", "Status", RlcDlSduTxLatencyResult, "Avg", iif(isnan(rlc_dl_SduTxLatency_avg), 0.0, rlc_dl_SduTxLatency_avg)),
    pack("Metric", "DL Delivery latency", "Status", RlcDlSduDeliveryLatencyResult, "Avg", iif(isnan(rlc_dl_SduDeliveryLatency_avg), 0.0, rlc_dl_SduDeliveryLatency_avg)),
    pack("Metric", "DL SDU Queue", "Status", RlcDlSduQueueBytesResult, "Avg", iif(isnan(rlc_dl_SduQueueBytes_avg), 0.0, rlc_dl_SduQueueBytes_avg)),
    pack("Metric", "UL Delivery latency", "Status", RlcUlSduDeliveryLatencyResult, "Avg", iif(isnan(rlc_ul_SduDeliveryLatency_avg), 0.0, rlc_ul_SduDeliveryLatency_avg))
)
| mv-expand Pair = MetricPairs
| project 
    Metric = tostring(Pair["Metric"]), 
    Status = tostring(Pair["Status"]),
    Avg = strcat(round(todouble(Pair["Avg"]), 2))

let good_emoji = "";
let empty_emoji = "";
let bad_emoji = "";

let timeStart = todatetime({timeparameter:start});
let timeEnd = todatetime({timeparameter:end});

let pdcpd = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "PDCP_DL_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), 
  isSRB = toint(stats_d.is_srb), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp)),
  sduDiscarded = todouble(stats_d.sdu_discarded),
  pduWindowPkts_avg = todouble(stats_d.pdu_window_pkts.avg),
  sduTxLatency_avg = todouble(stats_d.sdu_tx_latency.avg)
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| where imsi == "{IMSI}"
| summarize 
    pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg=avg(sduDiscarded),
    pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg=avg(pduWindowPkts_avg),
    pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg=avg(sduTxLatency_avg) by imsi
;

let pdcp_dl_stats = 
    (pdcpd
    | project imsi, pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg, pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg, pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg
    )
    | union (
        pdcpd
        | summarize count() 
        | where count_ == 0
        | project imsi="{IMSI}", 
        pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg=real(null), pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg=real(null), pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg=real(null)
    );

let pdcpu = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "PDCP_UL_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), 
  isSRB = toint(stats_d.is_srb), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp)),
  pduWindowPkts_avg = todouble(stats_d.pdu_window_pkts.avg)  
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| where imsi == "{IMSI}"
| summarize 
    pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg=avg(pduWindowPkts_avg) by imsi
;

let pdcp_ul_stats = 
    (pdcpu
    | project imsi, pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg
    )
    | union (
        pdcpu
        | summarize count() 
        | where count_ == 0
        | project imsi="{IMSI}", 
        pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg=real(null)
    );

pdcp_dl_stats
| join kind=fullouter pdcp_ul_stats on imsi

| extend PdcpDlSduTxLatencyResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg) or isnan(pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg), empty_emoji,
    pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg < {PdcpDlSduTransmissionThreshold}, good_emoji,
    bad_emoji
)
| extend PdcpDlSduDiscardedResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg) or isnan(pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg), good_emoji,
    pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg < {PdcpDlSduDiscardedThreshold}, good_emoji,
    bad_emoji
)
| extend PdcpDlPduWindowPktsResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg) or isnan(pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg), empty_emoji,
    pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg < {PdcpDlPduWindowPktsThreshold}, good_emoji,
    bad_emoji
)
| extend PdcpUlPduWindowPktsResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg) or isnan(pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg), empty_emoji,
    pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg < {PdcpUlPduWindowPktsThreshold}, good_emoji,
    bad_emoji
)

| project 
 PdcpDlSduTxLatencyResult,
    pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg = coalesce(pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg, 0.0),
    PdcpDlSduDiscardedResult,
    pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg = coalesce(pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg, 0.0),
    PdcpDlPduWindowPktsResult,
    pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg = coalesce(pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg, 0.0),
    PdcpUlPduWindowPktsResult,
    pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg = coalesce(pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg, 0.0)

| extend MetricPairs = pack_array(
    pack("Metric", "DL Tx latency", "Status", PdcpDlSduTxLatencyResult, "Avg", iif(isnan(pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg), 0.0, pdcp_dl_sduTxLatency_avg)),
    pack("Metric", "DL SDUs discarded", "Status", PdcpDlSduDiscardedResult, "Avg", iif(isnan(pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg), 0.0, pdcp_dl_sduDiscarded_avg)),
    pack("Metric", "DL PDU Window", "Status", PdcpDlPduWindowPktsResult, "Avg", iif(isnan(pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg), 0.0, pdcp_dl_pduWindowPkts_avg)),
    pack("Metric", "UL PDU Window", "Status", PdcpUlPduWindowPktsResult, "Avg", iif(isnan(pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg), 0.0, pdcp_ul_pduWindowPkts_avg))
)| mv-expand Pair = MetricPairs
| project 
    Metric = tostring(Pair["Metric"]), 
    Status = tostring(Pair["Status"]),
    Avg = strcat(round(todouble(Pair["Avg"]), 2))

content.query:
let timeStart = todatetime({timeparameter:start});
let timeEnd = todatetime({timeparameter:end});
 
let rlcd = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "RLC_DL_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi),
   isSRB = toint(stats_d.is_srb), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp)),
   numSduTx = toint(stats_d.sdu_tx_completed.count)
| where isSRB == 0 // Ignore signalling bearers for data throughput
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| where imsi == "{IMSI}"
| summarize
   rlc_dl_SduTxCount=sum(numSduTx) by imsi;
    
let rlc_dl_traffic_stats =
   (rlcd
     | project imsi, rlc_dl_SduTxCount
   )
   | union (
     rlcd
     | summarize count() 
     | where count_ == 0
     | project imsi="{IMSI}", rlc_dl_SduTxCount=long(null)
     );
     
let pdcpd = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "PDCP_DL_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi),
  isSRB = toint(stats_d.is_srb), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp)),
  newSdus = toint(stats_d.sdu_new_bytes.count)
| where isSRB == 0 // Ignore signalling bearers for data throughput
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| where imsi == "{IMSI}"
| summarize
    pdcp_dl_newSdus=sum(newSdus) by imsi
;

let pdcp_dl_traffic_stats =
    (pdcpd
    | project imsi, pdcp_dl_newSdus
    )
    | union (
        pdcpd
        | summarize count()
        | where count_ == 0
        | project imsi="{IMSI}", pdcp_dl_newSdus=long(null)
    );



let pdcpu = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "PDCP_UL_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi),
  isSRB = toint(stats_d.is_srb), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp)),
  sduDeliveredBytes = tolong(stats_d.sdu_delivered_bytes.total)
| where isSRB == 0 // Ignore signalling bearers for data throughput
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| where imsi == "{IMSI}"
| summarize
    pdcp_ul_sduDeliveredBytes=sum(sduDeliveredBytes) by imsi
;

let pdcp_ul_traffic_stats =
    (pdcpu
    | project imsi, pdcp_ul_sduDeliveredBytes
    )
    | union (
        pdcpu
        | summarize count()
        | where count_ == 0
        | project imsi="{IMSI}", pdcp_ul_sduDeliveredBytes=long(null)
    );


// Collate all results
let summary = rlc_dl_traffic_stats
| join kind=fullouter  pdcp_dl_traffic_stats on imsi
| join kind=fullouter  pdcp_ul_traffic_stats on imsi
;

let good=2;
let empty=1;
let bad=0;

let good_emoji = "";
let empty_emoji = "";
let bad_emoji = "";

let result = summary
| extend TrafficDlRequestedResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_dl_newSdus), empty_emoji,
    pdcp_dl_newSdus < {TrafficDlThreshold}, bad_emoji,
    good_emoji
)
| extend TrafficDlAchievedResult = case(
    isnull(rlc_dl_SduTxCount), empty_emoji,
    rlc_dl_SduTxCount < {TrafficDlThreshold}, bad_emoji,
    // check that the pdcp_dl_newSdus and rlc_dl_SduTxCount aew within 10% of each other
    abs(pdcp_dl_newSdus - rlc_dl_SduTxCount) <= 0.1 * iif(pdcp_dl_newSdus > rlc_dl_SduTxCount, pdcp_dl_newSdus, rlc_dl_SduTxCount), good_emoji,
    bad_emoji
)
| extend TrafficUlResult = case(
    isnull(pdcp_ul_sduDeliveredBytes), empty_emoji,
    pdcp_ul_sduDeliveredBytes < {TrafficUlThreshold}, bad_emoji,
    good_emoji
)

| project
    TrafficDlRequestedResult,
    TrafficDlAchievedResult,
    TrafficUlResult,
    pdcp_dl_newSdus,
    rlc_dl_SduTxCount,
    pdcp_ul_sduDeliveredBytes
| extend MetricPairs = pack_array(
    pack("Metric", "DL (requested)", "Status", TrafficDlRequestedResult, "Pkts", coalesce(pdcp_dl_newSdus, 0)),
    pack("Metric", "DL (Achieved)", "Status", TrafficDlAchievedResult, "Pkts", coalesce(rlc_dl_SduTxCount, 0)),
    pack("Metric", "UL (Achieved)", "Status", TrafficUlResult, "Pkts", pdcp_ul_sduDeliveredBytes)
)
| mv-expand Pair = MetricPairs
| project
    Metric = tostring(Pair["Metric"]),
    Status = tostring(Pair["Status"]),
    Pkts = tostring(Pair["Pkts"])
;
result

content.title: DL (Pkts)

content.query:
let timeStart = todatetime({timeparameter:start});
let timeEnd = todatetime({timeparameter:end});
let duration = timeEnd - timeStart;
let maxPoints = 10000;  // Hard limit for visualization
let baseStep = case(
    duration >= 7d, 15m,
    duration >= 3d, 6m,     
    duration >= 48h, 4m, 
    duration >= 24h, 2m,
    duration >= 12h, 1m, 
    duration >= 4h, 30s,
    duration >= 1h, 15s,
    duration >= 15m, 5s,
    5s  // Default step size
);
let totalPoints = tolong(duration / baseStep);
let scaleFactor = ceiling(totalPoints * 1.0 / maxPoints);  // Ensure step scaling
let adjustedStep = baseStep * scaleFactor;

let result = jrtc_dashboard_CL
| where stream_id_s == "dashboard"
| extend stream_payload_msg=todynamic(stream_payload_msg_s)  // Expand the array of stats_s into individual rows
| extend stream_index_s = tostring(stream_payload_msg.stream_index)
| where stream_index_s == "PDCP_UL_STATS"
| mv-expand stream_payload_msg.stats
| extend stats_d = todynamic(stream_payload_msg_stats)
| extend ueIndex = tostring(stats_d.ueid), timsi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.tmsi), supi = tostring(stats_d.ue_ctx.core_amf_info.supi), 
  isSRB = toint(stats_d.is_srb), timestamp = unixtime_nanoseconds_todatetime(tolong(stream_payload_msg.timestamp)),
  pduWindowPkts_avg = todouble(stats_d.pdu_window_pkts.avg),
  sduDeliveredBytes = todouble(stats_d.sdu_delivered_bytes.total)  
| where isSRB == 0 // Ignore signalling bearers for data throughput\r\n
| where timestamp >= timeStart and timestamp <= timeEnd
| where not(isempty(supi)) // Only include UEs connected for a longer time
| extend imsi = supi
| where imsi == "{IMSI}"
| where not(isnull(sduDeliveredBytes)) and not(isnan(sduDeliveredBytes)) 
| project timestamp, sduDeliveredBytes
;

let has_data = toscalar(
    result
    | where isnotnull(sduDeliveredBytes)
    | summarize count() > 0
);
let actual_tb = result
    | extend label = "Achieved"
    | make-series value = avg(sduDeliveredBytes)
        on timestamp 
        from timeStart to timeEnd 
        step adjustedStep 
        by label;
let empty_tb = datatable(label: string, timestamp: datetime, value: dynamic) [];
let actual = 
    union actual_tb, empty_tb
    | where has_data or isnull(value);
actual
content.title: UL (Pkts)
